review: Dr. Lokesh as an Orthopedic is a person whom I would suggest for all. Dr. Lokesh is always ready to attend patients in all emergency, he is very friendly and explains the issue by providing the perfect treatment for that. I met with an accident which caused leg injury and was treated under Dr. Lokesh. Dr. Lokesh handled the case very well and provided the treatment for the same.
